sys_documentation.label: Are all statements and comparisons accurate?

sys_documentation.hint:
"Evidence of the substantiation must be documented, including where any endorsements or testimonials are being made, and sources must be made clear.
Only answer N/A if no statements or comparisons are included in the promotion."
